Html:
Hi,

I have an application that loads an existing excel file and which replace by barcodes specifics texts in my cells.

I am using row and cell iterator to read document, and PHPExcel_Worksheet_MemoryDrawing class to generate my images.

Thing is working fine, except for image resizing in the new excel document (Excel 2007 writer).  When I am trying to resize a column or a row, it resizes at the same time my image, and worse not proportionnaly.
In openOffice or Excel, there is an option for an image object, to protect size.

Is there a method or a property in PHPExcel I haven't seen ?

Thanks for your answers!
